channel.title: CVE Feed for arraytics -- WP Timetics- AI-powered Appointment Booking Calendar and Online Scheduling Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for arraytics -- WP Timetics- AI-powered Appointment Booking Calendar and Online Scheduling Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-9263|2024-10-17T03:32:49.162Z -- arraytics -- wp%20timetics-%20ai-powered%20appointment%20booking%20calendar%20and%20online%20scheduling%20plugin
item.description: The WP Timetics- AI-powered Appointment Booking Calendar and Online Scheduling Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Account Takeover/Privilege Escalation via Insecure Direct Object Reference in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.25 via the save() due to missing validation on a user controlled key. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to reset the emails and passwords of arbitrary user accounts, including administrators, which makes account takeover and privilege escalation possible.

item.title: CVE-2024-1094|2024-06-14T14:24:05.033Z -- arraytics -- wp%20timetics-%20ai-powered%20appointment%20booking%20calendar%20and%20online%20scheduling%20plugin
item.description: The Timetics- AI-powered Appointment Booking with Visual Seat Plan and ultimate Calendar Scheduling plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the make_staff() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.21. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to grant users staff permissions.

item.title: CVE-2024-1094|2024-06-14T04:36:54.514Z -- arraytics -- wp%20timetics-%20ai-powered%20appointment%20booking%20calendar%20and%20online%20scheduling%20plugin
item.description: The Timetics- AI-powered Appointment Booking with Visual Seat Plan and ultimate Calendar Scheduling plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the make_staff() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.21. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to grant users staff permissions.

item.title: CVE-2024-1094|2024-08-01T18:26:30.510Z -- arraytics -- wp%20timetics-%20ai-powered%20appointment%20booking%20calendar%20and%20online%20scheduling%20plugin
item.description: The Timetics- AI-powered Appointment Booking with Visual Seat Plan and ultimate Calendar Scheduling plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the make_staff() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.21. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to grant users staff permissions.
